channel.title: Comments on: Hells Angels had a hit out on Mick Jagger

item.title: By: manny in ny
item.dc:creator: manny in ny
item.description: If the hells angels wanted anyone dead they could easily pull it off.I suspect the angels have had time to cool off 40 years later and the contract has been terminated.Thats cool,the stones are cool, and the angels just got caught up in a bad scene at altamont.There were too many people there.Everyone respects the angels here in new york state.We leave them alone and they dont bother too many people up here.
item.content:encoded: If the hells angels wanted anyone dead they could easily pull it off.I suspect the angels have had time to cool off 40 years later and the contract has been terminated.Thats cool,the stones are cool, and the angels just got caught up in a bad scene at altamont.There were too many people there.Everyone respects the angels here in new york state.We leave them alone and they dont bother too many people up here.

item.title: By: brian
item.dc:creator: brian
item.description: all the more proof that the rolling stones will never, ever die.
item.content:encoded: all the more proof that the rolling stones will never, ever die.
